adapter_name.title: LLM Adapter ID
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: palm-group-1

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your API key for the Palm API

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The name of the model to use for this adapter instance. Refer to https://ai.google.dev/models/palm Leave it empty to use the default model.

num_output.title: Number of Output Tokens
num_output.description: The number of tokens to generate. The higher the number, the longer the response will be. Leave it empty to use the default value.
